Label: Purpose
Language: To provide the user with the language of the resource.

Label: Entry Guidelines
Language: Enter a 3-letter code using the ISO 639-2 standard.

Label: Commentary
Language: This field is intended to indicate the language of the dataset, map, and/or supporting documentation.

Label: Controlled Vocabulary
Language: Yes - not strict. Ideally, choose from the ISO 639-3 language codes in the list of [Language Values](../ogm-aardvark/#language-values) below.
